name: Time Wizard (Termi-NayNay-Tor)
description:
Help the Time Wizard fetch his wand back from the Evil Evil Bullywugs!

I apologize if the Mac and Linux builds do not work. My whole house is Windows so I have no way of testing them. Please let me know if they do not work

I also apologize for the level select screen. I tried making levels lock, and while this worked in the editor, it did not work once the game was built. So if you're feeling really daring you can play the last level 1st :)
